page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: SPORTING The Lund Sports Association, formed this year (1985) provides netball for the ladies, cricket for the men, and Junior football and netball. There are facilities for junior and senior football at Kirkham and Wesham, and cricket facilities for under-14's, under-17's and seniors at Kirkham, Freckleton and Wrea Green. There are facilities for squash, badminton and table-tennis at B.N.F.L. Social Club. PRIVATE Most of the houses have a garden of sorts. Over 50% take a pride in their gardens, between 10 and 15% grow some of their own vegetables. AQUATIC AND AEROBATIC These have been referred to under "Clubs". Boating is practised on the canal at Salwick.
